item.description:
BEAT NIGHT @ The Press Room

~ ~ Jazz and Poetry Upstairs - NO COVER ~ ~

Come for dinner or just a drink.

Beat Night: It's Jazz and Poetry upstairs with no cover charge. Groovy.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hey (wo)man, be cool and get out of your pad on a Thursday night. We always have a hip time at the Press Room - and it's FREE!   Can you dig it?

Stay for just an hour or, like, stay as long as you want.  It's cool.

Arrive 6:30. Show 7-9pm.  Goatee optional.

Beat Night is an every-3rd-Thursday happening @ The Press Room.

Sometimes there's a band playing downstairs as well.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group, from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with attendance at, and travel to and from, this event. Alcohol consumption and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Your participation is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the S/O hipsters upstairs on the right facing the stage
item.name: Beat Night @ The Press Room
